title: Sheikh Abdullah meets Oman foreign minister
body_text:
Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Foreign Affairs, on Monday received Badr Al Busaidi, Omanâ€™s Minister of Foreign Affairs.
Sheikh Abdullah welcomed Mr Al Busaidi and discussed bilateral relations, as well as ways to enhance co-operation across various sectors.
They also reviewed a number of issues related to joint Gulf action, state news agency Wam reported.
